name: Prince of Persia
overview: Taken from hundreds of movie clips the animated sequences are so uncannily human you will be addicted in seconds. Your sword fighting skills will be tested to the full in this amazing puzzle solving challenge. A multitude of secret passages, fantastic rooms, violent opponents and magic potions await you in a bid to foil the evil Grand Vizier Jaffar and rescue the beautiful princess to become the PRINCE OF PERSIA.
